name: Grow fishy - Survive & become a Big Fish
name_original: Grow fishy - Survive & become a Big Fish
description:
Heavily inspired by old timer games like feeding frenzy. You have a small fish to control, eat and survive to become a BIG fish. Unlock new skins from your collected coins.

If you have any ideas on how to improve the game, please comment it down below. As a beginner game developer I'd appreciate the feedback before the eventual google play store release.

If you like this game please donate so I can develop other titles T.T

You can download and play on your windows PC or android phone too :)
